title: Community Values
description: Our community is built on mutual respect, support, and the pursuit of development in artificial intelligence and machine learning.

welcome.title: Welcome to DSML Kazakhstan
welcome.intro: Welcome to DSML Kazakhstan â€” the largest community of machine learning and artificial intelligence specialists in Kazakhstan! We unite professionals, students, and enthusiasts who share a passion for data, algorithms, and innovation.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To create an open and supportive environment for sharing knowledge, experience, and ideas in the field of AI and ML.

community.title: What Makes Us Special
community.description: Professional development through mentorship, regular events and workshops, career growth opportunities, and genuine connections between like-minded individuals.

guidelines.title: Content Guidelines
guidelines.relevant: Share content relevant to AI, ML, data science, and related technologies
guidelines.respectful: Maintain a respectful and professional tone in all interactions
guidelines.constructive: Provide constructive feedback and engage in meaningful discussions
guidelines.original: Share original work and properly attribute sources when sharing others' content

process.title: Moderation Process
process.description: We maintain a fair and transparent moderation system to ensure a healthy community atmosphere. Our goal is to help each member become their best professional self.

respect.title: Mutual Respect
respect.description: We value every member regardless of their experience level and treat everyone with dignity and respect.

learning.title: Continuous Learning
learning.description: We foster an environment where learning never stops and knowledge sharing is encouraged.

collaboration.title: Collaboration
collaboration.description: We believe in the power of working together to solve complex problems and achieve common goals.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We encourage creative thinking and innovative approaches to challenges in AI and ML.

diversity.title: Diversity & Inclusion
diversity.description: We celebrate diverse perspectives and ensure everyone feels welcome in our community.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: We strive for high standards in everything we do while supporting each other's growth.

cta.title: Ready to Join Our Community?
cta.description: Become part of Kazakhstan's leading AI and ML community. Connect with professionals, learn from experts, and grow your career.
